fff23035-6517-4d2b-a942-a7423c7d75a5.description: The Cloud Foundations Certification represents the knowledge and skill set required to understand core/essential cloud concepts such as Cloud Terminology, Environments and Characteristics, and the Cloud Financial Equation. The badge earner has demonstrated a strong understanding of the Epicor Cloud Value Proposition and how to drive success in their role.
fff23035-6517-4d2b-a942-a7423c7d75a5.name: Cloud Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Cloud Foundations - Certification Exam.

93486a47-5b90-437b-8868-ea6eaa973f4f.description: The Epicor ERP Purchase Management Certification represents the knowledge and skillset to operate, support or consult on the purchase features of the Epicor ERP product. The earner will be able to manage the important activities that guide the procurement-through-delivery processes of an organization. The badge demonstrates the earners' ability to understand the configuration and process settings to improve on-time deliveries, reduce inventory levels, enhance cash flow and increase profit levels
93486a47-5b90-437b-8868-ea6eaa973f4f.name: Kinetic Purchasing Management

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Purchasing Management - Kinetic Certification Exam.

1965a312-9d2f-4e42-8eb9-c7c51301fdd8.description: The Kinetic Sales Management Certification represents the knowledge and skillset to operate, support or consult on the sales features of the Epicor Kinetic product. The badge earner will be able to manage an efficient sales cycle using quoting, sales, and customer relationship management features. In addition, the badge demonstrates the earners ability to comprehend the settings that impact an effective analysis for case calls, leads, marketing activities, and profit margins.
1965a312-9d2f-4e42-8eb9-c7c51301fdd8.name: Kinetic Sales Management

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Sales Management - Kinetic Certification Exam.

db367826-a0d9-4955-96e2-8660dd24ec35.description: The Epicor Kinetic Inventory Management Certification represents the knowledge and skillset to operate, support or consult on the inventory features. The badge earner will be able to manage activities that govern the inventory process with key functions. It demonstrates the ability to use these settings to automate inventory transactions for effective coordination from initial raw materials to the ultimate delivery of the finished goods while driving down costs and increasing inventory velocity.
db367826-a0d9-4955-96e2-8660dd24ec35.name: Kinetic Inventory Management

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Inventory Management - Kinetic Certification Exam.

4ff7ea46-6627-4f38-a593-928c3b37a73b.description: The Kinetic Financial Management Certification represents the knowledge and skillset required to operate, support or consult on the financial features of the Epicor Kinetic product. The badge earner will be able to manage the overall financial and administrative activities of an organization. The badge demonstrates the earners ability to understand the settings that impact cost and reporting for financial and business activities.
4ff7ea46-6627-4f38-a593-928c3b37a73b.name: Kinetic Financial Management

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Financial Management - Kinetic Certification Exam.

ea8be5cc-8ebd-404a-8ee7-f8a633249c4f.description: The Epicor Kinetic Production Management Certification represents the knowledge and skillset to operate, support or consult on the production features. The badge earner will be able to manage the comprehensive solutions for make-to-order, make -to-stock, mixed-mode and engineer-to-order environments. The badge demonstrates the earners' ability to understand the configurations that automate and impact the planning, scheduling and cost accounting for lean manufacturing activities.
ea8be5cc-8ebd-404a-8ee7-f8a633249c4f.name: Kinetic Production Management

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Production Management - Kinetic Certification Exam.

e72774d3-37f4-40cc-bd10-941353843c8b.description: The Kinetic Tools Certification represents the knowledge and skillset required to operate, support or consult on the tool's features.The badge earner will be able to manage comprehensive solutions for retrieving and displaying data, modifying business process flows, customizing forms and reports, external integrations with Epicor Kinetic and leveraging Epicor Social Enterprises. The earner demonstrates the ability to design resource tools to inform users and solve practical or abstract problems
e72774d3-37f4-40cc-bd10-941353843c8b.name: Kinetic Tools Management

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Tools Management - Kinetic Certification Exam.

bed037f3-e781-4052-8653-03c833111931.description: The Kinetic Service Management Certification represents the knowledge and skillset to operate, support or consult on the service features of the Epicor Kinetic product. The badge earner will be able to manage the overall service, maintenance and project activities for an organization. The badge demonstrates the earners' ability to understand the configurations that help optimize project cost analysis, maintenance resources and to improve equipment productivity.
bed037f3-e781-4052-8653-03c833111931.name: Kinetic Service Management

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Service Management - Kinetic Certification Exam.

cda48c3f-f1c5-4f10-a20e-36a39f1e03ef.description: Individuals who achieve this Application Studio Certification demonstrate an understanding of features and options included with Epicor Application Studio. Badge earners will be able to demonstrate and discuss core concepts and approaches to using configurations and personalizations, as well as basic and extended UI modifications
cda48c3f-f1c5-4f10-a20e-36a39f1e03ef.name: Epicor Application Studio Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Epicor Application Studio Foundations Certification Exam

620206c2-2979-4e50-b3bd-300fdb7f0097.description: This credential represents the knowledge and skillset required to be Epicor Channel Sales Certified. The earner is certified to sell Epicor to their channel customers. The earner has demonstrated the ability to position the value of Epicor while following standard Epicor Channel Sales Processes, and is designed to ensure the highest levels of customer success and satisfaction.
620206c2-2979-4e50-b3bd-300fdb7f0097.name: Epicor Channel Sales Certified Americas

badge_template_activities.title: Passing this exam validates the expertise required to position the value of Epicor Kinetic as well as follow established sales methodology and forecasting requirements.

5584a2f7-ac79-4fe3-9491-a58bd9931d21.description: The Epicor ERP Technical Certification represents the knowledge and skillset required to manage, operate, support or consult on the administration of the Epicor ERP product. The badge earner will be able to manage Epicor ERP database, application servers, security, performance tuning and analyze system logs. The badge demonstrates the earners' ability to manage system resources, user accounts, set up new ERP environments, troubleshoot and resolve technical issues.
5584a2f7-ac79-4fe3-9491-a58bd9931d21.name: Kinetic Technical Management

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Technical Management - ERP Certification Exam.

c4d9d54c-5626-4fe8-9a2c-b25d74b48d6e.description: This exam targets knowledge required to install and administer Epicor Enterprise Content Management (DocStar). Passing this exam validates the skillsets needed to operate, support, or consult on the many document-related, workflow, security, and capture features of ECM. You will be able to manage and support the overall administrative activities of an organization's Epicor ECM solution. Earning this certification demonstrates your understanding of the functional systems that run ECM.
c4d9d54c-5626-4fe8-9a2c-b25d74b48d6e.name: Epicor ECM Administrator

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Epicor ECM Administrator Certification Exam

1f6e566c-450c-4a2c-9d3f-a2aaebdc98ff.description: Epicor Certified Services Partner are committed to excellence in consulting and training on Epicor Products. They have met defined certification requirements, and keep them current through product releases. By choosing a Certified Services Partner you will benefit from the knowledge and industry expertise they offer. Customers who work with Certified Services Partners also remain compliant with their Epicor Contract.
1f6e566c-450c-4a2c-9d3f-a2aaebdc98ff.name: Epicor Certified Services Partner

badge_template_activities.title: Consultants and support resources in this company meet or exceed required certification requirements for Epicor Certified Services Partner

3a8e0181-514f-4844-b08c-7e4ca956df91.description: The Partner has achieved Epicor’s highest tier: Platinum Certified. Platinum Partners are committed to maintaining a significant presence with Epicor and to enhancing customers’ growth potential through Epicor solutions. This status indicates that the Partner has met all qualifications including areas of Employee Certification, Customer Support, and Customer Satisfaction. Platinum Partners exhibit deep expertise in manufacturing and ERP systems; their experience distinguishes them in the field.
3a8e0181-514f-4844-b08c-7e4ca956df91.name: Epicor Platinum Certified Partner

badge_template_activities.title: This partner holds all required Epicor certifications for Consulting and Sales, they also meet or exceed required standards for support and customer satisfaction.

60554cb6-95f2-49ca-89c9-ee718dead5f5.description: Individuals who achieve this Certification demonstrate an understanding of features and options included with Epicor Commerce Connect (ECC). Badge earners will be able to demonstrate and discuss all aspects of an ECC base and express install. Additionally, this certification will validate participant understanding of client profiles and the alignment of ECC solutions to prospect needs.
60554cb6-95f2-49ca-89c9-ee718dead5f5.name: Epicor Commerce Connect Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Epicor Commerce Connect Foundations Certification Exam

969a6b07-fb8c-4b77-8878-af2745080ae7.description: The Epicor ECM Sales Certification represents the knowledge required to earn an Epicor ECM Sales Professional certification. Passing this exam is a validation of the skillsets required to understand basic ECM functionality, position, and sell to customers. The earner will be able to demonstrate key benefits and capabilities of an Enterprise Content Management solution.
969a6b07-fb8c-4b77-8878-af2745080ae7.name: Epicor ECM Sales

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Epicor ECM Sales Certification Exam

458740ab-6e73-4b80-a13d-b4354d661972.description: This Partner has achieved the Epicor Gold Certified Tier. Gold Partners are committed to maintaining a significant presence with Epicor and to enhancing customers’ growth potential through Epicor solutions. This status indicates that the Partner has met all qualifications for Gold Status, including areas of Employee Certification, Customer Support, and Customer Satisfaction. Gold Partners exhibit deep expertise in manufacturing and ERP systems; their experience distinguishes them in the field.
458740ab-6e73-4b80-a13d-b4354d661972.name: Epicor Gold Certified Partner

badge_template_activities.title: This partner holds all required Epicor certifications for Consulting and Sales, they also meet or exceed required standards for support and customer satisfaction.

b856e45b-d133-462b-be1a-9b999ac5cc84.description: This Partner has achieved the Epicor Silver Certified Tier. Silver Partners are committed to maintaining a presence with Epicor and to enhancing customers’ growth potential through Epicor solutions. This status indicates that the Partner has met all qualifications for Silver Status, including areas of Employee Certification, Customer Support, and Customer Satisfaction. Silver Partners exhibit expertise in manufacturing and ERP systems; their experience distinguishes them in the field.
b856e45b-d133-462b-be1a-9b999ac5cc84.name: Epicor Silver Certified Partner

badge_template_activities.title: This partner holds all required Epicor certifications for Consulting and Sales, they also meet or exceed required standards for support and customer satisfaction.

eff42ed7-0cd5-4ead-94cb-50c1027905a0.description: The Epicor ECM Sales Certification represents the knowledge and skills required to manage and support the overall administrative activities of an organization's Epicor Enterprise Content Management solution. It demonstrates the ability to understand the functional systems that run an ECM solution and be able to demonstrate value to customers
eff42ed7-0cd5-4ead-94cb-50c1027905a0.name: Epicor ECM Sales Engineer

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Epicor ECM Sales Engineer Certification Exam

7cd88628-33c1-4b49-bdd0-6179ebfe2582.description: This Individual has completed all required coursework as well as the self-paced implementation requirements in order to implement CPQ.
7cd88628-33c1-4b49-bdd0-6179ebfe2582.name: CPQ Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: This Individual has completed all required coursework as well as the self-paced implementation requirements in order to implement CPQ.

e781af24-4d51-4761-8b0a-91c31cc93811.description: This Individual has gone through the required SE training courses, has strong ERP product knowledge and can successfully demo the Kinetic product. Successful completion of Epicor product training courses, working knowledge of all core application modules, demonstrated skills regarding customer needs discovery, product preparation, and product presentation, graduation from Epicor Solution Engineering coursework.
e781af24-4d51-4761-8b0a-91c31cc93811.name: Epicor Certified Solution Engineer

badge_template_activities.title: This Individual has gone through the required SE training courses, has strong ERP product knowledge and can successfully demo the Kinetic product. Successful completion of Epicor product training courses, working knowledge of all core application modules, demonstrated skills regarding customer needs discovery, product preparation, and product presentation, graduation from Epicor Solution Engineering coursework.

44406c65-9e3b-4ef7-97bd-0dfb2a6e3abe.description: This credential represents the skillsets needed to operate, support, or consult on the many document-related, workflow, security, and capture features of ECM. The earner will be able to manage and support the overall administrative activities of an organization's Epicor Commerce Connect solution. Earning this certification demonstrates your understanding of the functional systems that run an ECC solution.
44406c65-9e3b-4ef7-97bd-0dfb2a6e3abe.name: Epicor Commerce Connect Implementation
